name: Beedrill
description: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Paralyze Poison
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is also Paralyzed.
